title: Bug 23935: Text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus
description: Both the Text widget and Tree widget are children of the shell. The issue is only observed on Windows. A potential workaround is to create the Text editor as a sibling of the Tree and move it above the Tree.
OB: On Windows, when clicking anywhere in the Tree widget, the Tree widget does not lose focus.
EB: In the expected behavior, when clicking anywhere in the Tree widget, the Tree widget should lose focus.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps:
1. Run the attached code.
2. Click anywhere in the Tree widget.
